'''Energizing Bento''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Invigorating Kitty Meal]] with [[Kirara]]. The recipe is obtainable by completing the {{Quest|Neko Is a Cat: Shrine Recipe}}.

Energizing Bento restores '''34'''% of Max HP to the selected character, and regenerates '''980''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
